Value.label: Door Lock Automatic Secure Timeout
Value.Help: After this time a CLOSE command is sent to the controlled door lock. On default no CLOSE command is sent assuming that the strike lock has its own timeout set. Default Value: 0

Value.label: Ring Button Press Basic Command OFF Timeout
Value.Help: After this time the Door Bell will receive an OF command regardless of the actual button is pressed or not. Default Value: 3

Value.label: Ring Button ON Command
Value.Help: This value is sent into Association Group 3 when the door bell button is pressed. Default Value: 255

Value.label: Ring Button OFF Command
Value.Help: This value is sent into Association Group 3 when the door bell button is released or the timeout has reached. Default Value: 0

Value.label: Central Scene ID for User Codes
Value.Help: This parameter defines if different user codes shall cause individual or similar scene ID sent to the main controller.
